item.title: Dozens missing as deadly 7.7 quake rocks Myanmar and Thailand
item.description: An earthquake with a 7.7 magnitude has rocked Southeast Asia on Friday, according to the United States Geological Survey.

item.title: 'Proud to be a team player,' Stefanik says after Trump pulls UN nomination
item.description: The White House has pulled Rep. Elise Stefanik’s nomination to be United Nations ambassador, President Donald Trump announced on Thursday.
